title: Skins checking way
body: Is there anyway to check what skins you other than clicking on each champ

replies.body: Currently, the Collections tab is the only way to see what content you've had unlocked.  If for any reason you need a detailed list of your purchases, though, you can hit up our[ privacy page](http://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/) and get that info for a fee.  I hope that helps!
